ComicInfo.Summary:
Overview
After ten years, Scud the Disposable Assassin RETURNS! The series ended on a cliffhanger with our robot hit man agreeing to destroy the world. Creator ROB SCHRAB (Monster House, The Sarah Silverman Show) vows to conclude this indie gem in a four-part miniseries.
Everyone comes back, yet some still exist. Now Scud, along with his old friend Drywall, is ready to take the fight to Voo-Doo Ben, but will they survive what comes next? Well one thing's for sure, as the saga of Scud's adventures draw closer to its world-shaking conclusion, anything is possible!
ComicInfo.Title: Return of the Over-Used Muse
